objects.specification: A flat rectangular exhibition floor panel with a subtle bevel on the edges, finished in a neutral light gray tone with a slightly textured matte surface to prevent slipping. The panel is precisely 10 meters wide and 6 meters deep, with a minimal thickness to appear sturdy yet unobtrusive, providing the foundation for all displayed items.

A tall back wall panel standing three meters high and ten meters wide, finished in a smooth neutral off-white matte paint. The panel has a thin profile of ten centimeters, with reinforced framing concealed within, creating a clean vertical backdrop to emphasize the displayed car.

A side wall panel three meters high and six meters deep, with a thickness of ten centimeters. The surface is coated in a neutral light gray matte finish; sturdy internal supports are hidden, offering a clean vertical surface for decorative displays.

A side wall panel three meters high and six meters deep, with a thickness of ten centimeters. The surface is coated in a neutral light gray matte finish; sturdy internal supports are hidden, offering a clean vertical surface for decorative displays.

A front-facing wall three meters high and ten meters wide, painted in neutral off-white. This panel features a large central opening for visitor entry, with two narrow columns on each side. The surface is smooth and matte, providing a welcoming entrance without visual obstruction.

A realistic scaled modern sedan with sleek aerodynamic body lines, high-gloss metallic red paint, tinted windows, detailed wheel rims, low-profile tires, and chrome accents on door handles and grille. The underbody is subtly illuminated to draw visitor attention to the car’s profile.

A sleek rectangular reception counter with beveled edges, sized for two people to stand behind. The front face is finished in a brushed metallic gunmetal gray, with a smooth black stone countertop. Cable management channels and a concealed storage compartment are integrated under the countertop.

A slender square pedestal with a one-meter height, finished in matte white. The top surface is a frame for a vertical banner showcasing vehicle specifications, with hidden internal wiring for integrated backlighting.

A slender square pedestal with a one-meter height, finished in matte white. The top surface is a frame for a vertical banner showcasing vehicle specifications, with hidden internal wiring for integrated backlighting.

A small cylindrical ceiling-mounted spotlight fixture in matte black, with a downward-facing soft white LED emitter. The fixture housing is 50 centimeters long and 10 centimeters in diameter, designed to focus a warm spotlight onto the car display.
